name: OxyTree
description:
This is my first game ever, made for Trijam#83. Dont't had the time to make what i wanted (like everyone i guess :p). I spent 4h doing it.

The game's rules are simple :

  • Don't let your oxygen drop at 0 (blue marker)
  • Trees require seeds (brown marker)
  • First tree give oxygen every X seconds
  • Second tree give seed every X second
  • Trees disappear after few second

Graphics asset from https://www.kenney.nl/

Make with Godot
